rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
计算模型可改善膝关节置换手术期间的植入物对准德克萨斯农工大学的一名博士生与一家创新的手术导航和机器人公司合作进行运动捕捉研究，该研究可能会改善膝关节置换手术期间的植入物对准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Computational-modeling-to-improve-implant-alignment-during-knee-replacement-surgeries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Computational-modeling-to-improve-implant-alignment-during-knee-replacement-surgeries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cfcde90-944a-4509-9558-9360c4713eb5 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 02:09:57 -0400 Computational modeling to improve implant alignment during knee replacement surgeries
使用 EHR 描述美国各地儿科过敏的模式在此类最大规模的研究中，费城儿童医院 (CHOP) 的研究人员使用来自超过 200,000 名儿科患者的电子健康记录 (EHR) 数据来描述全美儿科过敏模式，验证了一种被称为“过敏行军”的人群水平过敏发展模式，其中过敏首先表现为湿疹，随后是食物过敏、哮喘和环境过敏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Description-patterns-of-pediatric-allergies-across-the-United-States-using-EHR.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Describing-patterns-of-pediatric-allergies-across-the-United-States-using-EHR.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d34bb7f-9f6c-41e2-81c4-7a50e8264000 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 01:56:03 -0400 Describing patterns of pediatric allergies across the United States using EHR
设计疫苗以诱导对感染病原体更强的免疫反应牛津大学出版社在《生物学方法与实验方案》上发表的一篇新论文表明，设计疫苗可能会对感染病原体（例如引起 COVID-19 的病毒）产生更强的免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Designing-vaccines-to-induce-a-stronger-immune-response-to-infecting-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Designing-vaccines-to-induce-a-stronger-immune-response-to-infecting-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee93ebf6-e166-4d7b-a1eb-f1cd11126dd6 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 01:54:45 -0400 Designing vaccines to induce a stronger immune response to infecting pathogens
AXT 和 CELLINK 建立强大的澳大利亚生物打印合作伙伴关系随着技术的不断发展，3D 生物打印正在经历快速增长。澳大利亚和 AXT 的情况确实如此，他们在该领域已经根深蒂固，很高兴地宣布他们将通过与 CELLINK 合作来巩固自己的地位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/AXT-and-CELLINK-Form-a-Formidable-Australian-Bioprinting-Partnership.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/AXT-and-CELLINK-Form-a-Formidable-Australian-Bioprinting-Partnership.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42f9d294-5565-4e5b-8380-ee08f59faa9f Tue, 25 Jul 2023 01:46:00 -0400 AXT and CELLINK Form a Formidable Australian Bioprinting Partnership
研究揭示人们对抗疫苗者死亡有何反应一项新的研究表明，当公开拒绝接种 COVID-19 疫苗的人后来死于这种疾病时，观察者会对他们的命运产生复杂的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-how-do-people-react-to-anti-vaxxer-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-how-do-people-react-to-anti-vaxxer-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=993f0182-87da-4c6b-b20e-ca62328e7b5e Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:19:00 -0400 Study reveals how do people react to anti-vaxxer deaths
新的药物输送系统可能彻底改变异位妊娠的治疗俄勒冈州立大学药学院的研究人员开发了一种药物输送系统，该系统有望大大提高对患有危及生命的宫外孕的女性的药物疗效，宫外孕是指受精卵植入子宫内膜以外的地方时发生的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-drug-delivery-system-may-revolutionize-treatment-of-ectopic-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-drug-delivery-system-may-revolutionize-treatment-of-ectopic-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c9de226-e03c-4ede-b85a-2bd645db216a Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:15:00 -0400 New drug delivery system may revolutionize treatment of ectopic pregnancy
300万美元拨款用于研究睡眠和昼夜节律如何影响慢性疼痛睡眠不佳和昼夜节律会使慢性疼痛恶化吗？埃德森学院助理教授 Chung Jung Mun 计划通过一项创新的纵向研究来找出答案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/243-million-grant-to-study-how-sleep-and-circadian-rhythm-affect-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/243-million-grant-to-study-how-sleep-and-circadian-rhythm-affect-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=028c03c3-0d15-4399-bba9-3626220cac95 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:10:00 -0400 $3 million grant to study how sleep and circadian rhythm affect chronic pain
《减少通货膨胀法案》规定的 35 美元胰岛素上限与处方药配药量增加有关根据南加州大学谢弗健康政策与经济中心和威斯康星大学麦迪逊分校的一项新研究，《减少通货膨胀法案》的政策将胰岛素的自付费用限制为每月 35 美元，导致医疗保险受益人注射胰岛素的总数增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Inflation-Reduction-Acts-2435-insulin-cap-linked-to-rise-in-prescription-fills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Inflation-Reduction-Acts-2435-insulin-cap-linked-to-rise-in-prescription-fills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b0581e8-a145-4195-864c-f78fd6e6d553 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:08:00 -0400 Inflation Reduction Act's $35 insulin cap linked to rise in prescription fills
研究人员找到了一种减少医疗错误的简单有效的方法我们把自己的生命托付给医生，但令人悲伤和可怕的事实是医生可能会出错。每年约有 100,000 名美国人因医疗失误而死亡，最近的研究发现，有关患者诊断和治疗的所有临床决策中有 10% 至 15% 是错误的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Researchers-find-a-simple- effective-way-to-reduce-medical-errors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Researchers-find-a-simple- effective-way-to-reduce-medical-errors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d46d2afe-cbdb-41e2-b641-5e984e89ded2 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:04:00 -0400 Researchers find a simple, effective way to reduce medical errors
新技术可以改善癌症转移的早期检测当癌细胞获得在体内不同部位扩散并形成新肿瘤的能力（通常通过在血管或淋巴管内移动）时，就会发生转移。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-technique-could-improve-early-detection-of-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-technique-could-improve-early-detection-of-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=830a3749-9c82-453d-9e90-d9def7ec0f2e Mon, 24 Jul 2023 22:58:00 -0400 New technique could improve early detection of cancer metastasis
